愽字的基本解释

愽
bó
古同“博”，博爱。

愽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》補各切，入鐸，幫。］
亦作“愽1”。
(1)大。与“小”相对。
(2)广大；宽广。
(3)宽度，阔度。
(4)扩大；扩充。
(5)使扩大，使扩充。
(6)广泛；普遍。
(7)多；丰富。
(8)特指知识渊博丰富。
(9)通晓；通达。
(10)深。
(11)获取；得到。
(12)特指以贸易方式换取。
(13)博戏的用具。
(14)指博戏，又叫局戏，为古代的一种游戏，六箸十二棋。
(15)以金钱赌输赢，赌博。
(16)指以物赌输赢、角胜负。
(17)通“搏”。争斗；搏斗。
(18)通“搏”。击；触。
(19)见“博勞”。
(20)通“”。参见“博唼”。
(21)姓。宋有博尚之，明有博彦约。

愽字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　愽； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页397第04
【正字通】博字之譌。

愽字的起名意思

愽（ bó），"博"的异体字。

Stupefied
Basic explanation of words
Stupefied
bó
Gu Tong "Bo", fraternity.
Stupefied
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" make up each cut, enter the priest, help. ]
Also known as "愽1".
(1) Big. Contrast with "small".
(2) Broad; broad.
(3) Width and width.
(4) Expand; expand.
(5) To expand, to expand.
(6) Extensive; universal.
(7) Many; rich.
(8) Especially knowledgeable.
(9) Familiar; masterful.
(10) Deep.
(11) Obtain; Obtain.
(12) Specifically refers to exchange for trade.
(13) Gambling utensils.
(14) Refers to gambling, also called game, which is an ancient game, six chopsticks and twelve chess.
(15) Gambling with money to win or lose, gambling.
(16) Refers to gambling to win or lose, to win or lose.
(17) Through "beat". Fight; fight.
(18) Through "beat". Hit; touch.
(19) See "Bolau".
(20) Pass "". See "Bo Su".
(21) Last name. In the Song Dynasty, there was Bo Shangzhi, and in the Ming Dynasty, there was an appointment with Boyan.
Stupefied
